column1: Regular traffic reports will resume Monday June 29 at 6:30 a.m.

column3: Traffic Alert for Russell Cave Rd:
column4: Roadway shutdown in both directions between Carrick Rd and Ferguson Rd due to a structure fire.

column3: Traffic Alert for Russell Cave Rd:
column4: Estimated duration until 6 p.m., or longer if needed, then one lane will reopen.
